name: Help for Homeless
description: Local organization dedicated to combining and communicating efforts to combat homelessness in Somerset and surrounding areas. Provides resources, support, and coordination for homeless assistance programs. Maintains a resource room with supplies and connects individuals with available services.
source: Verified from official Facebook page, Chamber of Commerce listing, and Google search results
hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 9:00 AM-3:00 PM and by appointment
notes: Contact: Jessica Lee. Office phone: (606) 687-9011. Public Facebook group with 11.3K members for coordinating local homelessness efforts.
capacity: Varies based on available resources and community support
eligibility: Individuals experiencing homelessness or at risk of homelessness in Somerset area
